Description: Flake on dark flint, irregular shape.
Curator's comments: One of 11 flint flakes mentioned by Brunton in his tomb register for Grave 5104.
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (pl. V)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
